vote.title: Authorize an increase in the development loan agreement with Jaipur Lofts, LLC., or its affiliate, conditioned upon the completion of a third-party underwriting for the development of Jaipur Lofts, a 71-unit affordable 2022 9% Competitive Low Income Housing Tax Credit multifamily complex located at 2102, 2108, 2202, 2206, and 2208 Annex Avenue, Dallas, TX 75204 - Not to exceed $2,520,000.00, from $2,500,000.00 to $5,020,000.00 - Financing: Coronavirus Local Fiscal Recovery Funds (This item was deferred on June 28, 2023)
vote.description: Authorize an increase in the development loan agreement with Jaipur Lofts, LLC., or its affiliate, conditioned upon the completion of a third-party underwriting for the development of Jaipur Lofts, a 71-unit affordable 2022 9% Competitive Low Income Housing Tax Credit multifamily complex located at 2102, 2108, 2202, 2206, and 2208 Annex Avenue, Dallas, TX 75204 - Not to exceed $2,520,000.00, from $2,500,000.00 to $5,020,000.00 - Financing: Coronavirus Local Fiscal Recovery Funds (This item was deferred on June 28, 2023)
